title: Nutrizee
description: Nutrizee is a family-focused mobile app providing nutrition education and tools for families, including pre-pregnancy programs, pregnancy health, and toddler nutrition. It includes a computer vision-based food scanner, food tracking, and parenting dashboards. I led the project as Team Leader and Mobile Developer, overseeing feature design and Flutter app development. I also work as DevOps, preparing Infrastructure Server and Deployment with Azure Ecosystem (Open AI and Foundry).

title: Taksonify - Belajar Taksonomi Jadi Seru
description: Taksonify is an educational mobile app that uses gamification and computer vision to help students learn biological taxonomy. It supports both facilitated and self-paced learning, allowing users to scan flora/fauna to identify scientific names interactively. I served as the team lead and also Mobile Developer and Game Designer, implementing real-time object recognition and gamified learning features.

title: SIMPKL (Sistem Informasi dan Manajemen PKL)
description: SIMPKL is a web-based platform designed to streamline the internship process for vocational school students. It connects schools, companies, students, and parents to manage internship applications, progress monitoring, and evaluations in one integrated system. On this project I served as the Full-Stack Developer (Frontend, Backend, DevOps, QA) and sometimes lead this project. I'm responsible for build system architecture, API development, front-end interfaces, and deployment.

title: MoveQuest
description: MoveQuest is a gamified app designed to reduce digital addiction among children by motivating them to complete physical challenges and earn in-game rewards. As the Lead UI/UX Designer, I designed engaging visuals and developed user flow that encourages active behavior.

title: Neumedic
description: Neumedic is a mobile app designed to support the mental health of healthcare workers through features such as AI chatbots, relaxation checklists, and emotional tracking. The app was built as a response to Google's AI for Impact challenge focused on improving mental well-being among frontliners. As the Team Leader, I led the ideation process, oversaw the UX/UI design, and ensured the prototype addressed the key stress factors identified during user research.

title: Counter Carbon
description: Counter Carbon is a concept app for carbon tracking and reduction. The design focuses on clarity, user empowerment, and educational feedback using effective visualizations. I led as UI/UX Designer, conducting user needs analysis and building interactive mockups. Created for a UX Design class project.

title: BeSafety - Brainwave Based Public Transportation Safety System
description: BeSafety is an innovative safety monitoring system for public transport drivers using EEG (Electroencephalogram) technology to detect drowsiness or low attention levels. The system includes wearable sensors for drivers and a web-based dashboard to track cognitive conditions in real-time. I served as the Full-Stack Developer and Team Leader, managing hardware-software integration, real-time data processing, and system dashboard development.
achievement: Runner-Up IEEE YESIST12 IC 2024 Tunisia | 1st Place IEEE YESIST12 IC Prelims

title: e-Wise
description: e-Wise is a digital waste management app that encourages e-waste recycling through a gamified experience and community-based incentives. I acted as the Project Lead and UI Designer, designing reward systems, user flow, and leading app ideation.

title: Arunica Academy
description: Arundemy is a school-targeted Learning Management System equipped with gamified modules and an AI chatbot. Developed for the PKM-KC program to enhance digital learning experiences. I served as a Frontend Developer using React, collaborating on system flow and UI implementation.

title: TerraX
description: TerraX is a Web3-based property platform built using ICP (Internet Computer Protocol), providing secure, transparent, and efficient land transactions. I served as the Web3 Developer, implementing blockchain integration and smart contract functionalities.

title: RiseFarmer
description: RiseFarmer is a mobile app that empowers local farmers to sell rice and crops directly to consumers, minimizing distribution layers and increasing profits. I contributed as the Mobile Developer during my internship at Mobile Innovation Lab, developing key features and mobile interfaces using Flutter.

title: GiveFoods
description: GiveFoods is a UI design concept for a food donation app. Developed during an HCI class project, it emphasizes accessibility and user empathy. I worked as UI Designer and Group Coordinator, ensuring a user-friendly experience based on HCI principles.

title: Teman Wisata (f. SmartTourism)
description: SmartTourism is a travel planning app designed to help users create personalized itineraries and receive AI-driven destination recommendations. The app offers features such as trip suggestions, optimized scheduling, and budget management, tailored to user preferences. Developed as part of a university course project, I served as the Lead UI/UX Designer, responsible for designing the full user interface and mapping out the app flow from onboarding to destination recommendations.

title: Serenity AI - Smart Mental Health Mobile Chatbot
description: Serenity AI is a mental health companion mobile app designed to support teenagers in emotional self-care. The app features a Generative AI chatbot for empathetic conversation, emotion journaling, and mindfulness activity suggestions. As a team lead, I contributed as the Mobile Developer, Backend Developer, and UI Designer, building the React Native front-end, integrating Firebase, and connecting AI responses.

title: Academee
description: Academee was a design-based education project tackling SDG 4 (Quality Education). Using Design Thinking methods, we conducted user research, ideation, and prototyping to create an interactive app for students in underserved areas. I served as the Team Leader, coordinating user research, wireframes, and team roles throughout the project.

title: Portal Akademik Mahasiswa (Pama)
description: PAMA is a web-based academic portal inspired by typical university systems, enabling students to view class schedules, exam timetables, and grades. I worked as the Frontend Developer, implementing the user interface using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project contributed to my acceptance with a full scholarship at Telkom University.

title: Template Divi Premium Toko Online UMKM
description: This template provides an easy-to-use web storefront for MSMEs (Micro, Small, Medium Enterprises) using Divi and Elementor, without requiring any coding knowledge. I worked as the WordPress developer, building responsive, visually appealing templates tailored to non-technical users.
